text: The Lanka Sama Samaja Party is one of the largest political parties in Sri Lanka. It is often referred to as LSSP. ==History== It was the first political party in Sri Lanka (at that time known as British Ceylon). It was established in 1935 by Leslie Goonewardene, N.M. Perera, Colvin R. de Silva, Philip Gunawardena and Robert Gunawardena. ==Notes== Category:1930s establishments in Ceylon Category:1935 establishments in Asia Category:Communist parties in Asia Category:Organizations based in Sri Lanka Category:Politics of Sri Lanka
